title: Set Up Equation For the Given Condition
text: Let $$x=ml$$ of acetaminophen that Jocelyn needs. We can translate into a proportion $$\frac{ml}{pounds}=\frac{ml}{pounds}$$ which gives $$\frac{5}{25}=\frac{x}{45}$$.
speech: Let  x is equal to m l  of acetaminophen that Jocelyn needs. We can translate into a proportion , fraction, m l, over pounds,  is equal to fraction, m l, over pounds,   which gives  5 over 25 is equal to x over 45 .

title: Solve Equation
text: Solve for $$\frac{5}{25}=\frac{x}{45}$$. What is $$x$$? We can isolate $$x$$ by multiplying $$45$$ both sides. It gives $$x=9$$ as the final answer. Therefore, the doctor will prescribe $$9$$ milliliters of acetaminophen for Jocelyn.
